name: Stress Test (Duck Bear) (Duck Bear)
description:
Stress Test is a 3D first person remake of the original,  Stress Test: 10 Seconds; innovated with FPS controls and mechanics as well as new story and lore.

  • You play as Champ, the story's main protagonist, and your goal is to make it to the highest floor during durability tests.
STORY

Stress Test shows the story of an scientifically modified ball of energy named Champ, as he goes through a science lab's preplanned tests. Champ has no understanding of time, but Champ does have a mounted machine gun. Portable Operated Gizmo Laboratories created a dangerous machine they could modify at their will, originally designed  for laboratory studies and bothersome work, but turned to a robot capable of winning a war.

FLOPPY DISKS

As you explore the enclosed world, you will find multiple floppy disks that give the player a good challenge and a piece of the story.

INCLUDED
  • 16 different ultimates to activate.
  • 16 different grenade types to throw.
  • 16 different passive abilities to equip.
  • 13 different weapon types to use.
  • Multiple different enemies that will appear throughout each floor.
  • Multiple floors to conquer.
  • Multiple different positive and negative posters to keep you entertained and behaved.
  • Multiple different challenges to unlock and play through.
  • Constant replayability.
CONTROLS INPUT
ACTIONWASD / Arrow KeysMovementSpacebar / Numpad 0JumpMouseAimLeft Mouse ButtonShoot / InteractRight Mouse ButtonAim down sights / Zoom inQ / Numpad 1Throw grenadeF / Numpad 2Activate ultimate abilityLeft Shift / Right ShiftDash

Follow DuckBear/Pannda on Twitter and watch on YouTube to keep up with updates on future and existing projects.
